turns.content: Hello?

Hi Grandma, it's me! Can you guess who this is? It's so urgent... I really need your help right now. Something terrible happened and I'm in big trouble downtown at the county jail. They say I got a DUI, but please don't worry about that part. Right now, I just need to pay the bail or they'll hold me here longer! The officer says it's $8500, but if you can get even half of that, they might let me go with less. Can you send someone with cash right away? It's such an emergency... Please hurry and help your grandchild.

Oh my, Michael! What has happened to you? Eight hundred fifty dollars is a lot of money, but I'll try my best to help you. I don't have that kind of money in cash though. Can we do something else? Maybe transfer some money directly into the jail's account or... what should I do? Please tell me how to help you quickly.

Oh thank God, it's Michael! Yes Grandma, that's right. Listen, I don't want to involve anyone else in this mess because of the shame and all. The officer here says it needs to be cash for some reason. Can you send someone with $3000 or more? That might be enough to get me out on a lower bail or at least keep them from holding onto my car longer. Please hurry, I'm so scared and stressed here. Just tell anyone who comes that it's an emergency fee for release and not a bribe. It will all work out if you can help me fast.

Oh dear, Michael! I see your point about keeping this private. I'll try my best to get the money together somehow. Maybe I can ask one of your uncles or my friend next door for help with getting cash and taking it there. Is that okay? Please tell me you will be safe until then. This is such a worry, but I want to do what I can to bring you home soon.

Yes Grandma, thank you so much! Just make sure whoever goes has enough cash and knows exactly where the jail is downtown. Tell them it's urgent and they'll let them through. Please hurry though, every minute feels like hours trapped in here with no one. I promise once this is all sorted out, we'll talk more about everything. For now, just help me get home safely as soon as possible. Thank you for being there for me.

Of course, Michael. I will tell your uncle right away and ask him to take the money there quickly. He's a reliable person and he'll know what to do. Please hold on, dear. We'll get through this together. Stay strong and wait for your release. I love you, and we're going to make sure everything is okay very soon.

Thank you so much Grandma, I love you too! Just knowing someone's coming helps already. Tell Uncle he needs to act fast though, they might start charging more fees or something if it takes too long. Please hurry him along, but don't panic. We'll get through this and be laughing about it later once everything is sorted out. Thanks again, I'm counting on you!

I will make sure Uncle understands how urgent this is and he'll do his best to act quickly. Don't worry too much, Michael; we're all working together to help you. Just stay calm and wait for good news. We love you very much and want nothing more than to see you home soon.

You're the best Grandma! I'm trying my best to stay calm here, but it's really tough. Please make sure Uncle understands how important this is. Every second feels like an hour in here. But thank you for everything, I know we'll get through this together. Stay strong too, okay? Love you lots and waiting for good news!

I understand, honey, every second must feel so long. I will talk to Uncle again and make sure he gets there as fast as possible. We're all thinking of you and hoping for the best. You stay strong too, we'll be together soon. Love you lots, Michael.

Thanks Grandma, that means everything! Just knowing someone's coming helps so much. Tell Uncle to go straight there without stopping if he can manage it. Every minute counts now. But don't worry, I'm holding up okay here. Thanks again for all your help and love, can't wait until this is over and we're back home together. Love you!

I will tell Uncle to head straight there without delay. You're doing so well by staying strong; it must be incredibly hard for you. We'll see you soon, I promise. Love you very much, Michael. Stay safe until then.

Thanks Grandma, means the world! Tell Uncle he's a lifesaver and to hurry if possible. Every moment feels like forever here without family by my side. But knowing help is on the way helps so much. Can't wait for us all to be back home together soon as well. Love you lots too, stay safe until then please.

I will tell Uncle that he's a lifesaver and how important it is to hurry. You're doing incredibly well by staying strong, Michael. We can't wait to have everyone back home and everything will be okay very soon. Love you lots, and take care until we see each other again.

You too Grandma, really appreciate everything! Tell Uncle he's amazing for helping out like this. Every moment feels longer without family here but knowing someone is coming helps so much. Can't wait to get back home and be normal again soon. Love you lots as well, take care until then please.

I will tell Uncle how amazing he is for stepping up to help. You're doing so bravely by staying calm through this tough time. We'll all be together at home very soon, don't worry. I love you too, Michael. Stay safe and positive until we see each other again.

Thank you Grandma, means everything! Tell Uncle he's a hero for helping out like that. Every second feels long without family here but knowing someone is coming helps a lot. Can't wait to get back home and be normal again soon. Love you too, take care until we meet up soon.

I will tell Uncle how much of a hero he is for helping you. You're being so brave through this tough situation. We can't wait to have everyone back together at home. I love you as well, Michael. Take care and stay strong until we see each other soon.

Thanks Grandma, means the world! Tell Uncle he's a lifesaver for helping out like that. Every moment feels long without family here but knowing someone is coming helps so much. Can't wait to get back home and be normal again soon. Love you as well, take care until we see each other very soon.

I will definitely tell Uncle how much of a lifesaver he is for helping you. You're doing incredibly well by staying strong through this difficult time. We can't wait to have everyone back home and everything will be normal again soon. I love you too, Michael. Stay safe and take care until we see each other very soon.
